title: ICEYE’s four new Generation-3 satellites launch with SpaceX’s Transporter-8, introducing high-resolution Spot Fine image product
summary: ICEYE successfully launched four new Generation-3 SAR satellites on SpaceX’s Transporter-8 mission, introducing a high-resolution imaging product called Spot Fine. The satellites enhance ICEYE’s persistent monitoring capabilities with improved image quality and faster data downlink speeds. The launch expands ICEYE’s constellation to 27 satellites, with plans for additional launches in 2023.
why_it_matters: The launch strengthens ICEYE’s leadership in SAR remote sensing, enabling higher-resolution imagery and better monitoring for industries like insurance, natural catastrophe response, maritime, and national security. The new Spot Fine product improves detection capabilities for analysts and customers.
